Description: The Federal Reserve Board issued a consent cease and desist order and assessed a $975,000 civil money penalty against Banco Esporito Santo S.A.  and its U.S.  affiliate resolving allegations that the bank, without required notice or approval under the International Banking Act, operated representative offices in the United States.

Banco Espirito Santo S.A. agreed to settle alleged violations of the broker-dealer and investment adviser registration provisions and the securities transaction registration provisions of the federal securities laws.
